channel.title: Need help whith Clicking area

item.title: Need help whith Clicking area
item.dc:creator: @TheTutMan TheTutMan
item.description:
@TheTutMan wrote:

so i was adding my own login screen and i got to the but where you need to get i so when u click the text box you can type but i could not understand the code where you chanage it

//Username Clicking area if(super.clickMode3 == 1 && super.saveClickX >= 145 && super.saveClickX <= 25 && super.saveClickY >= 261 && super.saveClickY <= 145) loginScreenCursorPos = 0; //Password Clicking area if(super.clickMode3 == 1 && super.saveClickX >= 331 && super.saveClickX <= 505 && super.saveClickY >= 261 && super.saveClickY <= 288) loginScreenCursorPos = 1; //Username hover if(super.mouseX >= 145 && super.mouseX <= 321 && super.mouseY >= 261 && super.mouseY <= 288) { textbox = 1; } else { textbox = 0; } if(super.mouseX >= 331 && super.mouseX <= 505 && super.mouseY >= 261 && super.mouseY <= 288) { textbox1 = 1; } else { textbox1 = 0; }

And how would i change where The Username and password comes up when you type your infomation in

This is a pic of my New Login screen

Read full topic
